DOC.brief_title: Immune Responses Adults Revaccination With ADACEL® 10 Years After Previous Dose
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , multicenter study describe immunological response safety repeat administration adolescent/adult-formulation tetanus-diphtheria-acellular pertussis Tdap vaccine ( ADACEL® ) , 10 year follow initial administration Tdap vaccine .
